bike.description: Fuji Altair 1 aluminum with PowerDiamond down tube, top tube/seat tube gusset, down tube gusset, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: Fuji Altair 1, custom tapered 7005 aluminum with S-bend MonoStay, Cold forged dropout with CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger

components.description: SR Suntour XCT, w/ Preload adjust 75mm travel
Wellgo steel cage double sided with clips and straps
NEW Shimano ST-EF60 EZ Fire brake/shifter, 24-speed
Formula DC-22 sealed aluminium cassette, 36H w/QR
Alex DM-18 aluminum double wall, 36H w/machined braking surface
Kenda, K-841, Police Knite Glo reflective sidewall, 26 x 1.95"
Tektro IO Mechanical Disc w/ 160mm rotor
VP A-42E AheadSet threadless w/30mm spacers
Fuji aluminum ATB, w/ bar ends
Fuji Threadless powder coat aluminum w/ removable faceplate
